comment.text: This translation key is used to display the single sign-on setting. It appears on a provider settings page or in related UI elements, where users can configure their single sign-on options. The content of this key should be translated to describe the purpose and functionality of single sign-on for the specific use case it is displayed in.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Единично влизане' is a literal translation of 'Single entry' instead of 'Single sign-on'. While technically understandable, it doesn't convey the intended meaning accurately.  'Single sign-on' refers to a specific authentication system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Проверете дали има утвърден превод за 'Single sign-on' в контекста на продукта/платформата. Възможни алтернативи: 'Единствен вход', 'Централизиран вход', или нещо подобно, което отразява по-точно значението.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation contains a space before the double quotes. This is unnecessary and should be removed.
The Korean translation '싱글 사인온' is a transliteration of 'Single sign-on' and not a true translation. While commonly used in technical contexts, it lacks a more descriptive Korean equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more descriptive translation like '단일 로그인' (dan-il lo-gin) which means 'single login'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບດ້ວຍບຸສິ້ນດຽວ" is a literal translation of 'Single sign-on', it's not the most natural or commonly used term in Lao.  A more accurate and understandable translation would be "ການລ໊ອກອິນຄັ້ງດຽວ" or "ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບແບບດຽວ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການລ໊ອກອິນຄັ້ງດຽວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation 'Single Sign-On' is not properly capitalized. It should be 'Single Sign-On' or 'Enkele aanmelding' for a more natural Dutch translation.

While 'තනි පිවිසුම' (thani pivisuma) is a literal translation of 'single access,' it doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'single sign-on.' 'Single sign-on' implies authentication across multiple applications or services.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'එකම ල໊ගින්' (ekama logīn) or 'එකම අවසර පත්‍රය' (ekama avasara pathraya) which convey the idea of a unified login process across multiple services.
